data.text:
@Archimbaldo @pouch_captain Maybe linking to the protest outside Creaser's constituency office (later reported as outside her house).

I'm just disappointed I was never invited to any. I miss Walthamstow.
@thomasgreenwood @Archimbaldo @pouch_captain I think going for an inaccurate/out of date signifier is a clue that PM is writing for an outside audience - or just ignorant himself, of course!

@cymrurouge @pouch_captain not simply because they're of the centre - not unrelated but it's also because these are conspiracy theories & disinformation pushed by our state rather than the Russian one
@pouch_captain is it that Andrew Murray or other CPB figures live in walthamstow?
@breadandposes @Archimbaldo @pouch_captain Sure, but when you've been priced out of everywhere else... where isn't?

@Archimbaldo @pouch_captain The main thing anyone needs to know about Walthamstow is S*ella Creaseys Dad runs the local Labour Party like he's the head of a mafia family.  Odd that he picked there because we have a strong lab left across Waltham Forest but Walthamstow is probably where it is weakest.

@pouch_captain @Archimbaldo this dynamic then reinforces conspiracism. you would think how wide & robust qanon type stuff is would be enough to shake their cage but haven't seen any real signs. just cranks (unless we agree with them) - always the symptoms but never the cause. mason, who thinks he's gramsci.

@pouch_captain @Archimbaldo jukes, byline etc are conspiracists of the centre, yet given credibility not because they are not conspiracists but because they are of the centre. but mason and plenty of others will interact with these people.
